text: Gurjeet Singh Aujla is an Indian politician and a member of Indian National Congress and current member of Parliament for Amritsar in Punjab, India. Aujla got 444,052 (51.78%) votes while Puri finished second with 344,049 (40.19%) votes. == References == Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Politicians from Punjab, India
title: Gurjeet Singh Aujla
